                                throws IOException

        uuid - uuid of buy or sell order
        Returns:
        The status of the cancel request
        Throws:
        IOException - If there is a network error

                              throws IOException
        Used to retrieve the balance from your account for a specific currency.

        currency - string literal for the currency (ex: LTC)
        Returns:
        A GetBalanceResponse that represents the balance for the requested currency
        Throws:
        IOException - If there is a network error

      • getDepositAddress

        public GetDepositAddressResponse getDepositAddress(@NonNull
                                                   String currency)
                                            throws IOException
        Used to retrieve or generate an address for a specific currency. If one does not exist, the call will fail and return ADDRESS_GENERATING until one is available.
        Parameters:
        currency - A string literal for the currency (ie. BTC)
        Returns:
        A GetDepositAddressResponse that represents the deposit address for the requested currency
        Throws:
        IOException - If there is a network error

      • getDepositHistory

        public GetDepositHistoryResponse getDepositHistory(String currency)
                                            throws IOException
        Used to retrieve your deposit history.
        Parameters:
        currency - An optional string literal for the currency (ie. BTC). If omitted, will return for all currencies
        Returns:
        A GetDepositHistoryResponse that represents your deposit history for the requested currency
        Throws:
        IOException - If there is a network error

      • placeBuyLimitOrder

        public PlaceBuyLimitOrderResponse placeBuyLimitOrder(@NonNull
                                                     String market,
                                                     double quantity,
                                                     double rate)
                                              throws IOException
        Used to place a limit buy order in a specific market. Make sure you have the proper permissions set on your API keys for this call to work
        Parameters:
        market - A string literal for the market (ex: BTC-LTC)
        quantity - The amount to purchase
        rate - The rate at which to place the order
        Returns:
        A PlaceBuyLimitOrderResponse
        Throws:
        IOException - If there is a network error

      • placeSellLimitOrder

        public PlaceSellLimitOrderResponse placeSellLimitOrder(@NonNull
                                                       String market,
                                                       double quantity,
                                                       double rate)
                                                throws IOException
        Used to place a limit sell order in a specific market. Make sure you have the proper permissions set on your API keys for this call to work
        Parameters:
        market - A string literal for the market (ex: BTC-LTC)
        quantity - The amount to purchase
        rate - The rate at which to place the order
        Returns:
        A PlaceSellLimitOrderResponse
        Throws:
        IOException - If there is a network error
